@usedefaults

{{eco: id:$$id}}

h3. Actions

  {{actions:

- display: Accept
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'ACCEPTED'
  input:
  - comment
  
- display: Assign
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'ACCEPTED'
   
  input:
  - username
  
- display: Resolve
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'RESOLVED'
  input:
  - comment
  
- display: Mark unresolved
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'UNRESOLVED'
  input:
  - comment
    

- display: Close
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'CLOSED'
  input:
  - comment

- display: Re-Open
  action: /restmachine/system/errorconditionhandler/updateEco
  data:
   eco: $$id
   state : 'ALERT'
  input:
  - comment
    

}}


h3. Details
|*State*|${state}|
|*Assigned user*|{% if assigned_user %} ${assigned_user}{%endif%}|
|*Application Name*|${appname}|
|*Category*|${category}|
|*Job*|${jid}|
|*Type*|${type}|
|*Level*|${level}|
|*Process ID*|[${pid}|process?id=${pid}]|
|*Creation Time*|${epoch}|
|*Last Time*|${lasttime}|
|*Occurrences*|${occurrences}|
|*Error Message Pub*|${errormessagepub}|
|*Error Message*|${errormessage}|
|*Function Name*|${funcname}|
|*Function Line Number*|${funclinenr}|
|*Function File Name*|${funcfilename}|
|*Master Job*|${masterjid}|
|*Node*|[${nid}|node?id=${nid}&gid=${gid}]|
|*Grid*|[${gid}|grid?id=${gid}]|
|*Tags*|${tags}|

h3. History
{% if history %}
||User||Comment||State||
{% else %}
|NO HISTORY|
{%- endif %}
{% for h in history -%}
| ${h.user} | ${h.comment} | ${h.state} |
{% endfor %}

*Code* 
{{code: $$code}}

*BackTrace*
{{code: $$backtrace}}
